title: The Elegant Life Of The Reincarnated Aristocrat
alternative_title: 転生貴族の優雅な生活 ;Tensei Kizoku no Yuugana Seikatsu
status: 転生貴族の優雅な生活 ;Tensei Kizoku no Yuugana Seikatsu
description:
Description :
        When you're reborn in another world, is it unusual to get cheat abilities?I was supposed to have died in Japan, but when I opened my eyes I had become the heir of a marquis family, in other words, I had been born into a noble family! What's more, I can't believe I got cheat abilities "I was born into a new life, so let's enjoy this otherworldly life freely and gracefully" is what I thought, but Everyone likes me, men and women alike. On top of that, I'm being targeted by a talented assassin. I'm also being targeted by a handsome vampire and even a demon messenger is following me around!! I just want to live freely! If only I could enjoy the rest of my life freely and gracefully!I'm not sure how my life as an aristocrat in another world will turn out.The aristocratic and elegant otherworldly fantasy of Meiline, who was reborn into a marquis' family, has begun!+
